view.value:
Icon

Not shown in v1.

This section shows:

  • Total time executing JavaScript: Time taken by the monitored modules in the profile time duration.
  • Profile time duration: Actual trace interval that is 20 s +/- 5 sec. The interval time is varied to avoid bottlenecks saving the data to the database at the same time each interval.
  • Synchronous code execution: Percentage of the total time divided by the profile time duration.
  • Asynchronous wait time: Percentage of time asynchronous functions spent waiting for callback.
  • Application execution: Percentage of time spent executing application code.
  • System idle: Percentage of time spent idling.

The pie charts show the proportion of:

  • Synchronous and asynchronous function calls.
  • Busy and idle time.

For more information, see Tracing documentation.
